title: Vienna Bound Plane
caption: A quiet window, a plane, and a pocket of time before departure.
summary: Waiting for the flight to Vienna, a time to ponder how we got to this point.

title: Three Phonecalls
caption: Signals crossing time zones, three rings that change the route.
summary: Three calls force a decision that could no longer be avoided.

title: Resolution
caption: The meeting on the hill, stones aligned like commas in a long sentence.
summary: Making the most of an sudden opportunity.
